text: Ifin a certain code language, (i) ‘Pat Zoo Sim’ means ‘Eat Good Mangoes’, (ii) ‘Pus Sim Tim’ means ‘Mangoes and Sweets’ and (iii) ‘Tim Zoo Kit’ means ‘Purchase Good sweets’. Then which of the following statements is/are true? (a) ‘Pat’ means Eat’ and ‘Sim’ means ‘Mangoes’. (b) Zoo’ means ‘Good’ and ‘Pus’ means ‘and’. (c) ‘Tim’ means Purchase’ and ‘Kit’ means ‘sweets’. (d) ‘Kit’ means ‘Purchase’ and ‘Tim’ means ‘Sweets’.
